review: Love using it with Sling - that's the main reason I got it. Still learning about all its features and what is free versus what is paid.  Watching ESPN has been quite enjoyable.  Ease of use and simplicity is fantastic.  Occasional, very minor chopiness at times when streaming internet shows, and internet connection is usually 20mbps+ when this is occurring.  Not as noticible when streaming through Blu-ray player.  But, at the end of the day, it is so minor that it does not lower overall score below "4".
